english.segment1: Dont put all Your hopes in this flesh. This flesh, this mess I am. Empty promises my steady diet. Wont be quiet till I. Spread so thin devotion. Thus far my notions rant. Dont put all Your hopes. Dont put all Your trust in me. You must not see I cant
english.segment2: Set the sights on failing. Target no control. Grips relax and lose hold
english.segment3: I lose my defense at Your answers. And I come all undone with Your gaze
english.segment4: Sunless skies this progress. Thicker skin cant stretch the length. Wearying with face set against the elements. Is how I spent my strength
english.segment5: Set the sights on failing. Target no control. Grips relax and lose hold
english.segment6: I lose my defense at Your answers. And I come all undone with Your gaze. I lose my defense at Your answers. And my resolve at Your counter ways
english.segment7: I cant run forever. With the lions loose on me. Show us no escape. Lest we forget were dying. Fill my mind with Your thoughts. My lungs with Your breath. My mouth with Your words. My soul with Your death
